description: Pretty boy Bennett Anthony wakes up to a lavish breakfast and an offer of $20,000 to spend the next week with wealthy businessman, Dirk Caber. With cash in hand, Bennett walks into a high end clothing store but the stuck up salesmen, Brandon Moore and Colt Rivers, would not serve him just because he looks like a hooker. Bennett returns to the store after his shopping spree and teaches the pretentious bitches a lesson by fucking their tight, horny asses.
title: Pretty Boy Part 2
